Moldova

The Global Compact Network in Moldova was launched on 28 November 2006 at the event attended by the representatives of companies, the Government of Moldova, civil society and the donor community. The launch of Global Compact also marked the launch of the Growing Sustainable Business Initiative.

The creation of the Network has been spearheaded by a group of leading companies in Moldova including State Winery “Mileştii Mici”, Sun Communications, COVOARE Ungheni, ROMPETROL, ACOREX WINE, BIOPROTECT, ARHICONI GRUP, MOLDCELL, VOXTEL, Moldova Agroindbank S.A., Union Fenosa, Endava and Efes Vitanta Moldova.
